mapper.select: SELECT A.WCRF_ID , D.WCRF_NM , A.QY AS WCRF_CNT , A.PURCHS_AMT AS WCRF_AMT , D.ATCH_FILE_ID FROM TB_WCRF_BUY A, TB_WCRF_BUY_MST B, TB_WCRF_BUY_TOT C, TB_WCRF_INFO D WHERE 0 = 0 AND A.PURCHS_MST_ID = B.PURCHS_MST_ID AND B.PURCHS_MST_ID = C.PURCHS_MST_ID AND A.WCRF_ID = D.WCRF_ID AND C.PURCHS_LST_ID = #{purchsLstId} ORDER BY A.RGST_DT DESC
